body:
So
Those two girls were together in middle school and they were best friends and they promised to always be together
But when they started high school the girl with black hairs became very popular among guys and her best friend thought that she left her behind, so she started bullying her as a "revenge"
That girl with twintails was worried abt the situation between those two girls and decided to help by calling them to her mom’s love hotel and left these two together
The short girl began getting mad at her friend while yelling the reasons why she did all that so her friend knew that she wasn’t being just mean, but she was worried 
Then the fuck scene happened
还记得布卡漫画以前就可以看的说5555

This is the most confusing manga I've ran into so far. I don't get what the fuck just happened and I have lost all interest to know the plot. All the smears, overly long lines around moving objects etc. make too much of the manga incomprehensible. Not to mention too many panels with fast movement in a single manga. Fuck.
